physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features an image of a bungalow.  It is situated in the background of the photograph. There are groups of people standing in the verandah of the bungalow and sitting on its front steps.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows a colonial bungalow with family and servants posing on the veranda.The European men are dressed in white cotton drill jackets known as ‘jas tutup’ (“closed coat”) and matching trousers, or white shirts paired with batik trousers.

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
title_text: Photograph of a group of Europeans in the verandah of a colonial house A group of Europeans in the verandah of a colonial house
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Families Household employees Bungalows Architecture, Colonial Europeans
